trans-unit.source: Provides data for the CustomizeMapAreas event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data for hendelsen CustomizeMapAreas for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas> event of the Chart control.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir dataene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas>hendelsen for diagramkontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeMapAreas>

trans-unit.source: The only property of this class is the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>s property, which enables developers to: - Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen bare for denne klassen er den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>s-egenskapen, som gjør det mulig for utviklere å: – Slett eller tilpasse kartområder som er opprettet for et diagramobjekt; noen <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>objektet som har en ikke-tomme `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` eller `ToolTip` har et kart for tilknyttede området objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs.MapAreaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: -Legg til egendefinert kartområder som har en brukerdefinert form og koordinater.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified map areas collection.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeMapAreasEventArgs"> </xref> klassen med den angitte kart områdesamlingen.

trans-unit.source: Can be used to remove or modify map areas that correspond to a chart object, or to add custom map areas.
trans-unit.target: Kan brukes til å fjerne eller endre kartområder som tilsvarer et diagramobjekt, eller legge til egendefinerte kartområder.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to: - Delete or customize map areas that have been created for a chart object; any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> object that has a non-empty `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` or `ToolTip` property will have an associated map area object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du: – Slett eller tilpasse kartområder som er opprettet for et diagramobjekt; <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>, <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine>objektet som har en ikke-tomme `Url`, `MapAreaAttributes` eller `ToolTip` har et kart for tilknyttede området objekt.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.StripLine> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>

trans-unit.source: - Add custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates.
trans-unit.target: -Legg til egendefinert kartområder som har en brukerdefinert form og koordinater.
